Network Vision News Corp Australia Network Laura Csortan
title: How stars braved the heatwave
text:
Bikinis, beaches and boats: How stars are braving the headwatve Network Vision News Corp Australia Network Bikinis, beaches and boats: How stars are braving the headwatve Network Vision News Corp Australia Network Laura Csortan soaks up the sun at Bondi Icebergs. Picture: Instagram 
SPRING has put on an epic show, giving us a taste of the long summer days ahead. 
While you were soaking up the final few hours of the long weekend, likewise were the stars and sharing it all on Instagram. As the sunshine rolls on and the three-day fun comes to an end, relive the happy memories through the best pictures on social media. Natasha Oakley 
“Fun way to end the long weekend... Stand up, sit down, fall off!” - Jennifer Hawkins Jennifer Hawkins 
“The MacPhersons went boating... First day off in a long time. Family, Sunshine, saltwater and cold beer... perfection” - Daniel Macpherson Daniel Macpherson
